text: Sung Hyuk (born Hong Sung-hyuk on March 2, 1984) is a South Korean actor. He made his acting debut in 2005, and has starred in the television dramas Jang Bo-ri is Here! and You Are the Only One. == Filmography == === Television series === {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year !
